text: https://t.co/9JuvcsS4Lc  I could trace the issue. The compilation goes through if we add "apilib/*" instead of "apilib" in the config.resolve.alias. But if this is done this Sharing of modules (Singleton services ) does not work. @webpack

replyTo.text:
Compilation is failing with the "Module not found: Error" Compiler is not able to resolve the path alias.
 I have a path defined like "apilib/*" . So compiler gives error Can't resolve 'apilib/enum' . Any clue what can be wrong here. This was working fine with Angular 12
